text: Um, I think the station is this way...

Yeah, it's this way.
Follow me, Koito.

...Uh, the station isn't that way!
At the next intersection, turn right...

N-No... we've taken this path before,
so... I just happened to remember...

Koito, you have a good memory.
I completely forgot, haha...

If I make a mistake with directions again,
please let me know.

Y-Yes, I will...
But... you should try to remember the way properly...
